<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="armor_pieces">armor_pieces</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><comment pinned="false" h="89" w="533">Count how many ACTIVE pieces of Effect Armor the player is wearing.
